Victor Medeiros Outtes Alves

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/5203082526398229
  • Última atualização do currículo em 15/11/2017

Mestre em Ciência da Computação pelo Centro de Informática, da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2010). Bacharel em Engenharia da Computação pelo Departamento de Sistemas e Computação, da Universidade de Pernambuco (2007). Tem experiência em Visão Computacional e Redes Neurais Artificiais, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: Redes Neurais Artificiais Modulares para classificação; previsão de séries temporais financeiras; e processamento de imagens (segmentação, reconhecimento de padrões). (Texto informado pelo autor)

Produções

Produção bibliográfica
Trabalhos completos publicados em anais de congressos
1.
ALVES, Victor Medeiros Outtes; CAVALCANTI, George Darmiton da Cunha . A Nonexclusive Task Decomposition Method for Modular Neural Networks. In: International Joint Conference on Neural Networks (IJCNN), 2010, Barcelona. International Joint Conference on Neural Networks, 2010. p. 316-321.

2.
PEREIRA, José F. ; ALVES, Victor Medeiros Outtes ; CAVALCANTI, George Darmiton da Cunha ; Tsang Ing Ren . Modular Image Principal Component Analysis for Handwritten Digits Recognition. In: International Conference on Systems, Signals and Image Processing (IWSSIP), 2010, Rio de Janeiro. International Conference on Systems, Signals and Image Processing, 2010. p. 356-359.

3.
AMORIM NETO, Manoel C. ; TAVARES, Gustavo ; ALVES, Victor Medeiros Outtes ; CAVALCANTI, George Darmiton da Cunha ; Tsang Ing Ren . Improving Financial Time Series Prediction Using Exogenous Series and Neural Networks Committees. In: International Joint Conference on Neural Networks (IJCNN), 2010, Barcelona. International Joint Conference on Neural Networks, 2010. p. 2345-2352.

4.
AMORIM NETO, Manoel C. ; TAVARES, Gustavo ; ALVES, Victor Medeiros Outtes ; CAVALCANTI, George Darmiton da Cunha ; Tsang Ing Ren . Stock Price Forecasting Using Exogenous Time Series and Combined Neural Networks. In: International Conference on Computing in Economics and Finance, 2010, Londres. International Conference on Computing in Economics and Finance, 2010.

5.
ALVES, Victor Medeiros Outtes; CAVALCANTI, George Darmiton da Cunha . Tree Architecture Pattern Distributor: A Task Decomposition Classification Approach. In: International Joint Conference on Neural Networks, 2009, Atlanta. IEEE International Joint Conference on Neural Networks, 2009. p. 133-140.

6.
SANCHEZ, A. ; Carlos A.B.Mello ; Adriano L. I. Oliveira ; ALVES, Victor Medeiros Outtes . Text Line Segmentation in Images of Handwritten Historical Documents. In: IEEE International Workshops on Image Processing Theory, Tools and Applications, 2008, Sousse. Proceedings of IPTA2008, 2008.

7.
ALVES, Victor Medeiros Outtes; Adriano L. I. Oliveira ; E.R.Silva Jr ; Carlos A.B.Mello . Handwritten Digit Segmentation in Images of Historical Documents with One-Class Classifiers. In: 20th IEEE International Conference on Tools with Artificial Intelligence, 2008, Dayton. Proceedings of the 20th IEEE International Conference on Tools with Artificial Intelligence, 2008.

8.
Adriano L. I. Oliveira ; Carlos A.B.Mello ; E.R.Silva Jr ; ALVES, Victor Medeiros Outtes . Optical Digit Recognition for Images of Handwritten Historical Documents. In: Simpósio Brasileiro de Redes Neurais (SBRN'2006), 2006, Ribeirão Preto. Ninth Brazilian Symposium on Neural Networks (SBRN'06), 2006. p. 29.
